revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [(Col.) 16* (168?)];;(Mesore [. .] (= 26?), continued);;[Pamonneios], son of Anchorumphis and Didymarion, grandson of Pamonneios, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Zenas, son of Phaesis] and Tapasion, grandson of Zenas, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Apynchis, son of Petermouthis] and Thermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, for ch(--): 8 drachmai;[Total for the day: . . . drachmai] 28 obols.;;[On the . . (27th?), similarly:];[- - -, son of - - -] and Tapetaus, grandson of Satabous, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Phasis, son of Tesenouphis] and Thaesis, grandson of Harphaesis: the remainder of the ch(--);[Aphrodisios, son of Onnophris] and Ptolema, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Theon, son of Theon] and Zoidous, grandson of Petheus: 8 drachmai;[Petheus, son of Harsiesis] and Tapetheus, grandson of [Petheus], for the guards: 4 drachmai;[- - -, son of - - -] and Tepheros, [grandson of - - -], for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Petermouthis, son of Kastor] and Tasoucharion, grandson of Heraklas, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Horos, son of Chairemon] and Stotoetis, [grandson of Horos], for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Total for the day: 32 drachmai] 20 obols.;;[On the . . (28th?), similarly:];[- - -, son of - - -] and Sambathion, [grandson of - - -], for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[- - -, son of - - -] and Sambathion, [grandson of - - -]: 28 obols;[Gaius Valerius Diogenes, with the (dues)] on the account of Sempronia Gemella, [for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 13 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 4] 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 3 drachmai 1 1/2 obols; [for eparourion, 8 drachmai 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos], 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 29 drachmai 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi. (Lost in left margin: [28 drachmai 12 obols].);[Horos, son of Horos] and Taarmothes(?), [grandson of Horos]: 4 drachmai; (and) for ch(--), 12 drachmai;[Gaius Iulius Priscus] - (through) Nike -, [for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 10 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 2 drachmai 2 obols; for naubion], 1 [drachme]; for supplements, 2 drachmai 4 obols; [for eparourion, 6 drachmai 4 obols; for supplements, 3 1/2 obols; for kollybos], 2 1/2 obols. Total: 23 drachmai 4 drachmai. (Lost in left margin: [24 drachmai . . obols].);[Horos, son of Anchophis] and Teseuris, [grandson of Herakles]: the remainder of the ch(--);[Marcus Sempronius Gemellus] - (through) Diogenes the mad - [for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 4 drachmai 4 obols; for olive (transportation), 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 3 obols; for supplements], 1 [drachme] 1 obol 2 chalkoi; [for eparourion, 4 drachmai 3 1/2 obols; for supplements, 2 1/2 obols; for kollybos, 1 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 12 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (Lost in left margin: [12 drachmai . . obols.)

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC - Pearl OM, PMich IV/2, 358B, 1st column, 1939
